pages.text: The $(mob)Guardian$() is a monster found patrolling around $(thing)Ocean Monuments$(). It attacks players and $(l:minecraft_squid)$(mob)Squids$() on sight with a laser attack. The laser takes several second to deal damage after it starts being fired, and can be dodged by cutting line of sight or approaching the $(mob)Guardian$(). It also has spikes on its shell that hurt players attacking in melee when they are extended.
$(mob)Guardians$() drop $(item)Prismarine Shards$() on death. These can be crafted into various forms of $(item)Prismarine$() for decoration.
They also rarely drop $(item)Prismarine Crystals$(), which can be crafted into $(item)Sea Lanterns$().
